name: Fast-sass-utils
tagline: Small SASS / SCSS collection of utilities
body:
Fast SASS / SCSS Utils ====================== Requires Compass for font-face mixin Font ---- ~~~ scss @include load-font("FontFamily","folder/font-file-name"); ~~~ Layout Classes -------------- - left - right - clear ~~~ html
Content
Content
Content
Content
~~~ Dimensions ---------- ~~~ scss .h500 { @include force-height(500px); } .w500 { @include force-width(500px); } ~~~ Quick Background Classes ------------------------ - bg-white - bg-red - bg-blue - bg-green Quick Padding Classes --------------------- - pad-top-10, pad-top-20, pad-top-30 - pad-bottom-10, pad-bottom-20, pad-bottom-30 - pad-right-10, pad-right-20, pad-right-30 - pad-left-10, pad-left-20, pad-left-30 Quick Margin Classes -------------------- - right10, right20, right30 - left10, left20, left30 - bottom10, bottom20, bottom30 - top10, top20, top30 Acknowledgements ---------------- Â© 2013, Joshua Arvin Lat. Released under the [MIT License](LICENSE).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
